"For Whom the Belly Tolls":
"If you're going to celebrate, you need
tasty food!
I want to offer some unusual dishes that
most people won't have eaten before...
The problem is, I can't think of any.
Please, you have to give me some good
ideas!

※Target Lv.1+ enemies
※Can't accept after July 24th 11:00 JST"
